name: hnrealstate
description: HN Real Estate - Full Stack Application

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../admin-panel && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run backend" "npm run frontend" "npm run admin"
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../admin-panel && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build
